scenes.name: road
scenes.text-1: You have saved [stat.villagesSaved] village[if (stat.villagesSaved!=1)]s[/if]. You have [inv.sword] sword[if (inv.sword!=1)]s[/if]. [if inv.sword>0]You have a [s2]sword[/s]. [/if][if inv.sword<1]You don't have a [s2]sword[/s]. [/if]You walk on a road towards a [s1]town[/s].
scenes.text-2: [print var.scenes,1,choices,0,text] What do you do? There is also a [choice pickastick]stick[/choice] on the ground. You faintly hear a [choice dragon]dragon[/choice].
scenes.text-3: [speed 500]Sound volume is [print var.settings.soundSettings.soundVolume]. This links to Google. Divided by two times swords that is [print var.settings.soundSettings.soundVolume/2*inv.sword]. That you have slain a dragon is obviously [print stat.dragonsKilled>0]. Or what do you do not do?[/speed]
scenes.text-5: Your name is [input playerName]. Nice to meet you, [stat.playerName]!

choices.text: Keep walking. [if var.settings.soundSettings.soundVolume>0.7]jajaja[/if][if var.gameName==kakkonen] this game has a weird [if inv.sword<3]and boearkoraeroak[/if] name[/if]
Throw your sword and a sandwich away
Search for a magical shield (10% success chance)
Save a [s1]village[/s] [if stat.villagesSaved<1](You haven't saved any!!!)[/if]
Unsave a village [if stat.villagesSaved+1>(25/5)]this is shown when villages 5 or more[/if]
Pick up a random sword lying around (50% success chance)

scenes.name: dragon
scenes.text: You wander across a [s1]dragon[/s] with [inv.sword] teeth. What do you do?

scenes.name: hitDragon
scenes.text: You hit the dragon! The dragon is dead!

scenes.name: missDragon
scenes.text: You missed the hit! The dragon charred you!
